item.title: Cellphone video fuels local debate over ICE agent's deadly force in Minneapolis shooting
item.description: Protests across the U.S. and locally in western Washington continue for a fourth day after an ICE agent shot and killed Renee Good.

item.title: Rallies in US after woman shot and killed by ICE agent
item.description: Thousands of demonstrators took to the streets of Minneapolis chanting the name of the woman killed by a federal agent in the city, amid widespread anger at use of force in the Trump administration's immigration crackdown.

item.title: Protesters rally in Fayette County after woman shot, killed by ICE agent
item.description: Protesters in Fayette County joined others across the country, demonstrating after an ICE agent shot and killed a woman in Minnesota.

item.title: Anti-ICE protests erupt across Colorado after fatal Minnesota shooting
item.description: Protests over immigration enforcement broke out across Colorado on Saturday after fatal and nonfatal officer-involved shootings in Minneapolis and Portland.

item.title: Colorado protesters rally in solidarity with Renee Good, killed by ICE agent in Minnesota
item.description: Hundreds of protesters rallied across Colorado on Saturday in solidarity with Renee Good, the woman who was shot and killed by an ICE agent in Minneapolis on Wednesday.

item.title: Tom Emmer pushes back on suggestion that Minnesota anti-ICE protesters have been peaceful
item.description: Minneapolis protests continue after an ICE agent fatally shot a woman, with House Majority Whip Tom Emmer blaming Democratic leaders for ongoing tensions in the city.

item.title: Hundreds protest in Moorhead for woman killed by ICE agent
item.description: The group gathered for a peaceful protest on the busy Eighth Street to honor the life of a woman shot and killed by a U.S. immigration agent earlier in the week in Minneapolis.

item.title: Inquest report exonerates Mountie in fatal shooting of machete-wielding attacker
item.description: An inquest report into the fatal police shooting of a man — who moments earlier had used a machete to attack someone in a vehicle — praises the actions of the officer and makes no recommendations on how the incident could have been handled differently.

item.title: Minneapolis: Attempted ramming attack, suspect eliminated
item.description: US officials say an ICE officer shot and killed a suspect who allegedly tried to ram federal agents with a vehicle during an enforcement operation in Minneapolis.
